title: A new super-hydrophobic material inspire of butterfly wings
description: The fly of insects are sometimes chaotic but most of the time there is something gracious in their ability to fly, even if it rains cats and dogs. For this particular reason, scientist have studied the molecular structure of butterfly wings.

title: An anti-reflective coat inspire of moth eyes
description: As a nocturn being, moth have developed a biomaterial who possess anti-reflective capability, this ability has interested scientist for the potential benefices which will help improve our technologie.

title: A nanomaterial with the ability of killing superbugs by contact
description: Every living being face in one way or in other infectious deseases, but some of them have developed an uncommon way of protection. this ability could be a solution to our bacteria resistance problems.

title: The unbreakable shell of iron beetles.
description: Beetles are know for the hardness of their shell and how difficult it is to break them even for us as human. But one of them outclass all, iron beetle. For this reason, scientist lead a study to understand the resistance of their shell.

title: A new plastic material inspire of spider web.
description: spider webs are known for their extreme resistance, but what could we made if we combine their structures with plastic ? The answer, a new material which is as much durable as plastic and as much resistant as spider web.

title: Artificial eyes mimics ours retina.
description: The dream of synthetic eyes is not new, but with the apparition of a new technique and composant, this could be soon available.

title: Pretty as a peacock : The gemstone for the next generation of smart sensors
description: Discovery of new photonic crystal with potencialy a lot of applications in our current life.
